description: DISPLAY OF INTERNALLY ILLUMINATED FASCIA SIGN AND PROJECTING BOX SIGN.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The period of this consent shall expire 5 years from the date of this notice.  Reason for Condition: As required by the Town and Country Planning (Advertisement Regulations) 1989.

Condition : 2 - Any advertisements displayed, and any site used for the display of advertisements, shall be maintained in a clean and tidy condition to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.  Reason for Condition: To conform with the provisions of Schedule 1 Regulation 2(1) of the Town and Country Planning (Control of Advertisements) Regulations 1989 and to preserve the visual amenities of the locality.

Condition : 3 - Any structure or hoarding erected or used principally for the purposes of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a safe condition.  Reason for Condition: To conform with the provisions of Schedule 1 Regulation 2(1) of the Town and Country Planning (Control of Advertisements) Regulations 1989.

Condition : 4 - Where an advertisement is required under these Regulations to be removed, the removal shall be carried out to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority. Reason for Condition: To conform with the provisions of Schedule 1 Regulation 2(1) of the Town and Country Planning (Control of Advertisements) Regulations 1989 and to preserve the visual amenities of the locality.

Condition : 5 - No advertisement shall be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant permission.  Reason for Condition: To conform with the provisions of Schedule 1 Regulation 2(1) of the Town and Country Planning (Control of Advertisements) Regulations 1989.

Condition : 6 - No advertisement shall be sited or displayed so as to obscure or hinder the ready interpretation of any road traffic sign, railway signal or aid to navigation by water or air, or so as otherwise to render hazardous the use of any highway, railway, waterway (including any coastal waters) or aerodrome (Civil or Military).  Reason for Condition: To conform with the provisions of Schedule 1 Regulation 2(1) of the Town and Country Planning (Control of Advertisements) Regulations 1989.
Condition : 7 - The intensity of illumination of the sign shall be to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.  Reason for Condition: To preserve the visual amenities of the locality.
